vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_VAULT.startContract (patch_8.sol#37-40):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == TransferLog.owner()) (patch_8.sol#38)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stopped (patch_8.sol#39)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_VAULT.stopContract (patch_8.sol#32-35):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == TransferLog.owner()) (patch_8.sol#33)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stopped (patch_8.sol#34)
